name: ENERGY STAR
description: EPAs Automated Benchmarking System (ABS) is a free web service designed to exchange energy use data and facility information, with EPAs Portfolio Manager software tool. Using XML-based Web Services provided by the EPA, third-party energy service companies can securely provide energy and building data from their systems to Portfolio Manager in exchange for receiving the EPAs energy performance rating and other related energy and environmental performance metrics. The documents and applications described below help you assess the technical knowledge necessary to use ABS to provide your customers with the 1 to 100 energy performance ratings.
